creator: -Teemu 'TemeK1' Käpylä
text: Thank you for using Scribble 2000. It is very simple, but yet, powerful application for scribbling notes that add some spice and color on your life. App is free, and it's not infested with ads and never will be.
text2: If you have ideas, suggestions, feedback or whatsoever, feel free to contact me via email.
text3: If you like Scribble 2000 and for some weird reason would like to buy me mug of hot 'n steamy coffee as a sign of support, please feel free to use following link.
text4: Your notes are only stored into a local Realm-database of the application.
